name: Cyber-Invasion
description:
Cyber-Invasion is a 2D Hyper Casual game where you have to survive as long as possible against waves of Slimes.

In this game you have to shoot, dodge and jump. You have to be faster to destroy the slimes otherwise you will be overwhelmed. You are an astronaut who must fight for this survival. 2 styles of Slimes that each have their own way of attacking.

This game playable with the mouse and Keyboard.

CONTROLS :

⭐ - LEFT CLICK to Shoot.

⭐ - SPACE BAR to Jump

⭐ - Q and D to Move

TOOLS USED :

🔧 - Unity (2020.3.15f2 Version)

🔧 - Audacity

🔧 - Krita

DEVELOPER :

Martin JOUBERT itch.io - Instagram - Twitter - YouTube - Fiverr
